name: MicroorganismsDetectionByBloodCulture
title: Microorganisms Detection by Blood Culture
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable panel codes for microorganism detection in Blood Culture.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood for microorganism detection.),(Inclusion Criteria: Microorganism detection in blood culture, coded in LOINC, using panel codes. LOINC will need to be referenced for the individual laboratory observations associated with these panel code(s).),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent Blood Culture tests as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
